Challenge

Class WallEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Challenge.Entity
      • Challenge.Enemy
        • Challenge.WallEnemy

  • class WallEnemy
extends Enemy
    A wall enemy is an enemy whose movement is determined by the walls in the map, it should always stick to a wall and have it's movement determined by the walls around it. If for whatever reason it finds itself with no walls be it through bad level design or entity removal it will move randomly until it comes into contact with a wall again.
    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    George Carpenter, Ioan Mazurca, Angelo Balistoy
